results.title: Dasabala sutta - Ten Powers
results.description: Endowed with ten powers and four assurances, the Buddha reveals the impermanence of the five aggregates and teaches dependent co-arising.

results.title: Parivīmaṁsana sutta - Thorough Investigation
results.description: The Buddha explains the process of thoroughly investigating the arising and cessation of suffering through dependent co-arising.

results.title: Upasīvamāṇavapucchā - Questions of Upasīva
results.description: The venerable Upasīva asks the Buddha for a basis to rely upon to cross the great flood of existence. He then inquires about the destiny of one who is fully liberated.
